articles.title: Garudan movie review: Suresh Gopi, Biju Menon film is gripping and solid, unlike many recent Malayalam thrillers - The Indian Express
articles.description: Garudan movie review: Arun Varma's Garudan, starring Suresh Gopi and Biju Menon in the lead roles, is a breath of fresh air for viewers inundated with mindless thrillers that have dominated our industries in recent times.
articles.content: It has indeed become difficult for filmmakers to impress audiences with crime movies/series, given that a significant portion of the content being consumed nowadays falls under this (broad) genre. Pa… [+5793 chars]

articles.title: 'Aankh Micholi' Review: Mrunal-Abhimanyu’s comedy film tests your patience - India Today
articles.description: Director Umesh Shukla's 'Aankh Micholi', starring an ensemble cast, is a silly comedy film, that's outdated. Read our review.
articles.content: Comedy of Errors is a genre that Hindi cinema has aced for decades now. Be it the original ‘Golmaal’ or Rohit Shetty’s take on it, or ‘Dhamaal’, ‘Hera Pheri’ and Hungama,’ the list is endless. Not al… [+2509 chars]
